ingredients.ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can HORMEL® Mary Kitchen® Corned Beef Hash
2 (8 ounce) packages refrigerated seamless crescent dough sheets (such as Pillsbury®)
1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, softened - divided

cookingTips: Warm the corned beef hash slightly before spreading so it's easier to work with and distributes evenly
Divide cream cheese between the two dough sheets for even filling coverage before rolling and slicing
Cut pinwheels with a sharp knife dipped in water to prevent sticking; space them on the baking sheet for even browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These are perfect for appetizers or a quick brunch. Would you like to serve them with mustard, horseradish cream, or a cheese sauce?
